verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Vai-ya-'an Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <S%H1085><s%> bil-Dad Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <S%H7747><s%> hash-shu-Chi, the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar. and said

הַמְשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> ham-Shel Dominion וָפַ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> va-Fa-chad and fear עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo; Who עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh [are] with him he maketh שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Lom, peace בִּמְרוֹמָֽיו׃ <S%H4791><s%> bim-ro-Mav. in his high places

הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh Is there מִ֭סְפָּר <S%H4557><s%> Mis-por any number לִגְדוּדָ֑יו <S%H1416><s%> lig-du-Dav; army וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and מִ֝֗י <S%H4310><s%> Mi, any לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum arise אוֹרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H216><s%> o-Re-hu. his light

וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- How יִּצְדַּ֣ק <S%H6663><s%> yitz-Dak be justified אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh How then can man עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; God וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- How יִּ֝זְכֶּ֗ה <S%H2135><s%> yiz-Keh, he be clean יְל֣וּד <S%H3205><s%> ye-Lud [that is] born אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah. ess

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen If עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- even יָ֭רֵחַ <S%H3394><s%> Ya-re-ach Behold even to the moon וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יַאֲהִ֑יל <S%H166><s%> ya-'a-Hil; and it shineth וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <S%H3556><s%> ve-cho-cha-Vim, not yea the stars לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no זַכּ֥וּ <S%H2141><s%> zak-Ku are not pure בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nav. in his sight

אַ֭ף <S%H637><s%> 'af How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh How much less man רִמָּ֑ה <S%H7415><s%> rim-Mah; maggot וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <S%H8438><s%> to-le-'Ah. oppressor פ Peh
